h2-start-looking.title: When can I start looking for a job?
h2-start-looking.p1-2: before you can begin applying for jobs.
h2-start-looking.p2: You cannot apply for jobs or work while The Norwegian Directorate of Immigration (UDI) processes your application.

1-link-panels.1-title: Questions and answers around collective protection
1-link-panels.2-title: Protection for those who have fled Ukraine
1-link-panels.3-title: Are you intending to work in Norway?

h2-find-job.title: Where can I find a job?
h2-find-job.p1: You can look for a job at arbeidsplassen.no, one of the largest databases for job advertisements in Norway. Here you can also find
h2-find-job.p2-2: at arbeidsplassen.no you can follow a live broadcast where companies present themselves and the positions you can apply for.  Jobbtreff is mainly held in Norwegian. Take a look at
h2-find-job.p2-3: if you can find one in English.

h2-assistance.title: Who can I contact for assistance and guidance?
h2-assistance.p1: If you need assistance finding a job, you can
h2-assistance.p1-2: for information and guidance.  If you are registered as a job seeker at NAV, NAV can help you to get in touch with relevant employers and provide you with various measures in order to get a job. You can
h2-assistance.p1-link-text-2: register as a job seeker at nav.no (Norwegian language).
h2-assistance.p1-3: If you need assistance you can contact your local NAV office.
h2-assistance.p2-link-text-3: Video - Register as a job seeker
h2-assistance.p2: You have the right to get an interpreter when contacting NAV.
h2-assistance.p3: If you have questions, please call NAV at 55 55 33 33

3-link-panels.2-title: More information about job searching (Norwegian language)

h2-working-wo-norwegian.title: Where can I work without Norwegian language skills?
h2-working-wo-norwegian.p1: Employers might set up language requirements through the job advertisement.  If you can communicate in basic English, you can look for
h2-working-wo-norwegian.p1-2: or where English is specified as working language.

h3-norwegian-courses.title: Norwegian courses
h3-norwegian-courses.p1: Persons with granted collective protection may be entitled to free Norwegian courses. Further
h3-norwegian-courses.p1-2: and your rights to attend free Norwegian courses are to be found at the official website of IMDi.
h3-norwegian-courses.p2: There are also possibilities to learn Norwegian language skills while working through the flexible fast track.

4-link-panel.title: Information about the Introduction Programme, language instruction and Flexible fast track
